mapper.select: /*택배 거래처 리스트*/ select couacc_name, couacc_area, char_manager, char_tel, couacc_cnt, to_char(startdate,'yy-mm-dd') startdate, to_char(enddate,'yy-mm-dd') enddate from courier
/*잡지 거래처 리스트*/ select com_name, char_manager, char_tel, char_email, to_char(startdate,'yy-mm-dd') startdate, to_char(enddate,'yy-mm-dd') enddate from magazine_company
